author: cschomak
body:
The plotting of the y-range has been improved. The range given by the user is now used exactly instead of just being an upper limit

Options plotPng and plotOnlyGlobal added as possibilities to reduce the number of output plots and thus the time to run the tool.

Additionally, some obsolete code in GeometryComparisonPlotter.cc was removed
title: Geometry comparison: Plotting of y-range improved and print options added
